meta.title: Agio | Local-first AI Second Brain for Notes (PKM)
meta.description: Agio is a local-first AI second brain for notes. Auto-formatting, title generation, hashtag extraction, and smart categorization—built for founders and knowledge workers.

hero.body: Built for founders and knowledge workers. Capture notes fast—Agio uses AI to format, title, extract hashtags, and auto-categorize so your system stays organized without maintenance.
hero.subtext: Local-first by design. No busywork—just clarity. Join the waitlist for launch access.

features.headline: Capture once —
features.body: Most note apps get abandoned when upkeep starts. Agio is an AI second brain that turns messy notes into a clean, searchable knowledge base: auto-formatting, title generation, hashtag extraction, and smart categorization—done instantly.

intelligent.title: Zero-maintenance notes
intelligent.description: Write naturally. Agio formats your note, generates a clear title, and extracts hashtags automatically—so you never spend time “cleaning up.”

discovery.title: Find anything, fast
discovery.description: Search your second brain and resurface key context when you need it—decisions, ideas, and next steps across projects.

crafted.title: Local-first, built for focus
crafted.description: Your knowledge stays on your device by default—fast, private, and always available. (Links and video capture via extension coming.)

vision.label: Vision
vision.headline: A second brain you’ll still use in six months.
vision.body: Agio is designed to remove the maintenance tax that kills most PKM systems. Capture quickly, stay organized automatically, and keep your knowledge useful over time—without constant tending.

footer.body: Join founders and knowledge workers who want AI organization without the maintenance overhead.
footer.disclaimer: No spam. Just launch access and product updates.

thankYou.title: You're on the list.
thankYou.body: Thanks for joining the Agio waitlist. We'll reach out with early access and updates soon.
